params._platformType: The platform type for the agent (Twitter, Telegram, or Discord)
params._tokens: Array of token addresses that the agent will support
params.authorizedSigner: Address that will be authorized to execute trades

returns._0: agent The address of the newly created Agent contract

getAgentInfo(address,uint256).notice: Returns information about a user's agent by index
